thread.title: Mr Matthew Dyer
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Mr Matthew Dyer

author: Mr Matthew Dyer
title: Mr Matthew Dyer
text: Never used Tyresonthedrive.com before but ordered online as the price was competitive with blackcircles and because I work largely from home so thought it would be convenient. The rep turned up, had a quick chat and then did four tyres in under an hour which would never happen at most high street tyre fitters, he even wiped the white stuff off the tyre so I don't need to get the car wash again! Would happily recommend them to anyone and will definitely use them again.
